# Government Tender Announcement

### Notice Title
W0142-24X001: Parts and Aqueous Washers with Service and Maintenance

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4017272699-Doc4017272758
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4017272699
* **Notice Date**: June 7th, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 22nd, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 1st, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 31st, 2024

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide, deliver, and set up parts and aqueous washers for the BATUS Workshops and the CFB Suffield Maintenance shop. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all materials, labor, travel, and expertise required to provide the rental and regular maintenance of the parts and aqueous washers.

### Tender Requirements

* The tender must include all supporting documentation and be submitted by the tender closing date.
* Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.
* The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contracting Entity Details

* **Department/Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* **Contact**: Wall, Ruwani (SPAC/PSPC) - [ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16516761?extsite=MTY1MTY3NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### UNSPSC Code
73161600 - Manufacture of transport equipment

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open bidding

### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price Response
